roleset.name: quote
roleset.note: QUOTE-V NOTES: Based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'say'. Member of VNcls transfer_mesg-37.1.1-1. (from quote.01-v)
QUOTE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to quote.01-v. VN class transfer_mesg-37.1.1-1. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from quote.01-n)

example.name: quote-v: quote as saying
example.text: The company's prepared statement quoted him as saying "The CEO succession is well along and I've decided for personal reasons to take early retirement."
example.arg: as saying "The CEO succession is well along and I've decided for personal reasons to take early retirement."

example.name: quote-v: quote at; re: stocks
example.text: Seats-1 currently are quoted *trace*-1 at $400,000 bid, $425,000 asked.

example.name: quote-v: complex utterance
example.text: [The benchmark 30-year bond]-1 was quoted *trace*-1 late at 102 12/32 *trace* to yield 7.90%.

example.name: quote-n: with args 2 and 3
example.text: the announcer reads favorable quotes about the model from Motor Trend and Road& Track magazines
example.arg: from Motor Trend and Road& Track magazines

example.name: quote-n: args 1 and 2
example.text: a quote from Chairman David Boren "Don't hold your tickey until the show's over"
example.arg: "Don't hold your ticket until the show's over"

example.name: quotation-n
example.text: And what sense does his quotation of the words of Worton and Still actually make in the context of his discussion of "Respect for Context"?
example.arg: of the words of Worton and Still
